meanings.definition: Relating to the study or treatment of rheumatic diseases.
meanings.sent1: The rheumatological research team discovered a new treatment for arthritis.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often use rheumatological tests to diagnose joint conditions.
meanings.sent3: The rheumatological conference was so full of information, it felt like a medical marathon.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to rheumatological studies was as strong as a steel joint.
meanings.sent5: The importance of rheumatological care cannot be overstated for those with joint pain.

meanings.sent1: The rheumatological department at the hospital specializes in joint disorders.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue a career in rheumatological research to help patients with arthritis.
meanings.sent3: The rheumatological textbook was so thick, it could double as a weight for exercise.
meanings.sent4: His passion for rheumatological studies burned brighter than a healthy joint.
meanings.sent5: The rheumatological clinic provided relief for many suffering from rheumatic diseases.
